scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build-ff && npm run build-cr
scripts.start-ff: npm run build-ff && web-ext run -s dist/firefox --devtools
scripts.start-cr: npm run build-cr && web-ext run -s dist/chrome --devtools --target chromium
scripts.export: npm run export-ff && npm run export-cr
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add src/_firefox/manifest.json && git add src/_chrome/manifest.json
scripts.preexport: rimraf dist-prod && npm run prod-ff && npm run prod-cr
